alert.note: Alert for Coastal Calhoun; Inland Calhoun; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 8:35PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN CALHOUN AND CENTRAL VICTORIA COUNTIES THROUGH 900 PM CDT... At 834 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles east of Wood Hi to Downtown Victoria. Movement was south at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Victoria, Port Lavaca, Guadalupe, Point Comfort, Victoria Colony Creek Country Club, Alamo Beach, Dacosta, Wood Hi, Bloomington, Magnolia Beach, Victoria Detar Hospital North, Victoria Riverside Park, Placedo, Victoria College, Victoria Mall, Saxet Lakes, Brentwood Subdivision, Victoria Regional Airport, Telferner, and Ball Airport Area. This includes the following highways... US Highway 59 between mile markers 630 and 642. US Highway 77 between mile markers 574 and 576, and near mile marker 586. US Highway 87 between mile markers 806 and 840. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
